review: Works as advertised, disappointed that it has no parental controls, since I put it into my daughters room. It does allow to restrict purchases or add a pin for everything, but not much good it she has to come get me to enter the pin for every move she makes. If your purchasing for a child's room, better go with the more expensive TV option.
author: Kenny W.

review: This was extremely easy to install and get started using it.April 12, 2015: very disappointed. Can watch Amazon Prime content, but not Netflix. Diagnostics indicate a good connection for NF though. So if you plan on watching NF, do not buy this.
